title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not have any effect. Nothing happens when this option is chosen.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option in the context menu for fields in the Type Hierarchy view should add Javadoc for the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view
2. Select a field in the view
